title: Evening Poem
text:
At dusk all the bees are in their beds
little white flowers spread over the grass
look like flecks of cocaine
soon to be hoovered up by my lawnmower
I am the stillness of the trees
and the whir of the motorway
I am the little bats
that dance around my resting head
their little wings nodding at the dead

title: Two Lonely Children
text:
You are all talk
I'm all talk too
we dance
and dance
until our heads are spinning
just for a chance
tos say that we're winning
don't look inside
to what we cover up
 two lonely children
in our hearts
are stuck
